title: CPQ Architect
description:
Are you looking for a hybrid or remote work opportunity? Are you ready for a workplace that provides benefits that suit your needs? Do you seek a workplace where you grow and transform your career?  

Relativity is looking for a **CPQ Architect** with expertise in CPQ, Lead to Cash, and financial systems to join the Business Systems and Applications team. The **CPQ Architect** works under minimal direction of IT Applications Director and senior team members and reviews work and provides guidance for less experienced colleagues.

As a **CPQ Architect**, you will be responsible for the architecture, operation, maintenance, and championing of the Salesforce CPQ and other financial systems applications across Relativity. The **CPQ Architect** works with the discipline team to apply critical thinking to understand and solve problems in a scalable manner and make well thought-out decisions that move business objectives forward. You will participate in ideation sessions with our business partners to discover current platform pain points, define business objectives, and determine required solution capabilities to enable and optimize platform health. You will champion data governance and complete technical debt projects. The ideal candidate is curious, detail oriented, and thrives on being collaborative while solving hard problems.

This position reports to the Director, IT Applications.
### **Responsibilities**

* CPQ and other financial systems application initiatives with an emphasis on Lead to Cash, billing, revenue, and accounting applications
* Collaborates on key projects to determine business alignment, needs, and system requirements
* Works with Developers, Admins, and IT Business Service Managers to deliver scalable business solutions to internal stakeholders
* Participates in design workshops, research, decision-making and testing
* Effectively applies critical thinking to understand and solve problems, makes well thought-out decisions to quickly and positively create results
* Manages application data connections, including but not limited to Salesforce CPQ, Zuora, Intacct, and Ironclad
* Establishes, implements, and follows best practices regarding change management, system maintenance, configuration, development, testing, data integrity, etc.
* Ensures proper security models are in place and maintained for data access
* Thoroughly documents work for reference, troubleshooting, and future iteration
* Tracks work progress/status, identifies risks/constraints and shares/escalates issues as necessary
* Troubleshoots and resolves advanced user issues as they arise
* Maintains certifications and continues to develop skills with each new release

### **Skills**

* 3+ years experience on full cycle Salesforce CPQ design and development
* 5+ years experience on Sales Cloud and/or Service Cloud development
* Proven experience in architecting a Salesforce CPQ solution for mid-size to large company with 500+ employees
* Support the entire Salesforce CPQ implementation roadmap, from requirement gathering, design, development, to deployment
* 2+ years of billing, revenue, and accounting applications in a subscription product experience is preferred
* Strong understanding of business processes with an emphasis on Lead to Cash and/other financial systems management and process improvement
* Expertise designing, building, and maintaining declarative automation
* Experience working on cross-functional projects
* Experience with giving strategic input or participating in strategic planning
* Strong internal customer focus and service orientation with the ability to interact effectively with employees and vendors at all levels
* Knowledge of data loading, manipulation and normalization
* 5+ years supporting an organization larger than 500 employees in a system administrator or analyst capacity
* Detail-oriented, curious, self-starter with ability to work both independently and in a team environment

### **Preferred Skills**

* Salesforce certified CPQ Advanced Specialist
* Salesforce certified Architect preferred
* Experience with enterprise orgs with 500+ users
* Experience designing processes and solutions for software companies
* Experience building SOQL or comparable queries
* Experience working in an Agile environment

### **Compensation**

* Relativity is committed to competitive, fair, and equitable compensation practices. This position is eligible for total compensation which includes a competitive base salary, an annual performance bonus target of 10%, and long-term incentives. The expected salary range for this role is between $104,000 and $141,000. The final offered salary will be based on several factors, including but not limited to the candidate's depth of experience, skill set, qualifications, and internal pay equity. Hiring at the top end of the range would not be typical, to allow for future meaningful salary growth in this position.


Relativity is a diverse workplace with different skills and life experiences—and we love and celebrate those differences. We believe that employees are happiest when they're empowered to be their full, authentic selves, regardless how you identify. **Benefit Highlights:**Comprehensive health, dental, and vision plans
Parental leave for primary and secondary caregivers
Flexible work arrangements
Two, week-long company breaks per year
Unlimited time off
Long-term incentive program
Training investment program **Transparency in Coverage Information**
The Transparency in Coverage Final Rule requires disclosure of the negotiated rates with in-network providers and the historic allowed amounts paid to out-of-network providers, for all health plans available to employers. Files containing this information for the plans covered are published on this page.**Link:** https://www.bcbsil.com/asomrf?EIN=123456789 *All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, or national origin, disability or protected veteran status, or any other legally protected basis, in accordance with applicable law.*

title: DevSecOps System Architect (Remote)
description:
**Spiral Solutions and Technologies, Inc. (Spiral)** is seeking a DevSecOps System Architect to join its team!  
**Location: Remote Locations**

The DevSecOps System Architect will assist the Program Manager with guiding the team's system and software development efforts towards successful project delivery in accordance with the System and Software Development Life Cycle (DSLC), Agile with Lean Kanban methodology and will work collaborative in a Development, Security, and Operations (DevSecOps) Agile environment.

This position is contingent upon Data for Decisions (D4D) contract award.

Requirements:

* Comply with all Policies and Procedures, project plans, and industry standards, to include Spiral Solutions, Federal, State, local, DoD, and co-contractors.
* Assist the Program Manager with guiding the team’s system and software development efforts towards successful project delivery in accordance with the System and Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), Agile with Lean Kanban methodology. All products will be delivered with accuracy, meeting or exceeding customer requirements, and either on time or ahead of schedule.
* Participation in Agile Team activities is mandatory. These activities include Daily Stand-up, Sprints, Regular reviews and retrospectives, and design meetings.
* Create and maintain high standards of system and software quality by creating software product and process documentation for all deliverables. This includes the preparation of system and software design specifications, installation documents, and system architecture information, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, code comments, clear code, reports, and manuals, which ensures the most mature deliverables.
* Creates and maintains written and verbal procedures; prepares written technical documentation, training material, standards, reports, and other documents as assigned or requested by the Program Manager.
* Work closely with the Program Manager to ensure all external taskings or customer requests are vetted, documented via requirements process, and incorporated into the applicable project plan.
* Collaborate with teammates with maintaining, upgrading and potentially migrating legacy web applications and platforms to current technologies and cloud platforms.
* Ensures applications of system analysis techniques and procedures to include consulting with senior staff to determine hardware, software, and/or system functional specifications.
* Ensures stability, interoperability, portability, security, and/or scalability of the Military Lending Act (MLA), Servicemembers Civil Relief Act (SCRA), and Joint Duty Assignment Information System (JDAMIS) web applications.
* Communicates with senior staff to quantify specific current and future system requirements.
* Identifies DMDC systems data, hardware, or software components required to modernize system architecture.
* Perform proof of concept to evaluate new and emerging technologies, design patterns, and proposed solutions.
* Evaluates current or emerging technologies against cost, portability, compatibility, or usability.
* Provides general networking, computer, and other technology training and support as needed.
* Prepares and maintains a variety of records and reports related to assigned activities; provide special reports as requested by the Program Manager.
* Collaborate with DMDC staff, stakeholders, and other customers when directed by management, U.S. Government officials and co-contractors to design and implement features.
* Attention to detail is essential and all tasks must be carried out to the highest standard.
* Incorporate continuous education to improve skill sets and to integrate new emerging technologies in all projects. This includes studying state-of-the-art development tools, programming techniques and computing equipment; participating in educational opportunities; reading professional publications; maintaining personal networks and participate in professional organizations.
* Provide technical leadership and support to further develop new hires and current software engineers by providing advice, coaching, and participate in Peer learning.
* Identify and encourage areas for growth and improvement within the team and for Spiral Solutions.
* Participate in peer-reviews of solution designs and related code and provide constructive feedback.
* Assess opportunities for application and process improvement and prepare documentation of rationale to share with team members and other affected parties.
* Provide operation support as needed or when requested by the Program Manager

**Education and Experience:**N/A

Home | Spiral Solutions & Technologies, Inc. (ssandtech.com)

title: Senior Data Center Network Engineer/Architect
description:
**Senior Data Center Networking Engineer/Architect**


**About:**


At M247, we believe that a well-designed and well-built infrastructure makes for a strong foundation. It is this belief that drives us to continuously research and discover new products and solutions and refine our process and methods so we can continually serve our customers.


Our mission is to empower businesses with seamless, reliable, and secure IT solutions. We strive to create innovative and customized networking services that cater to the unique needs of our customers across healthcare, financial, energy, and retail sectors. Our passionate commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction drives us to shape the future of IT, enabling organizations to thrive and grow in an increasingly connected world.




We are currently accepting resumes from competent people for our team of Senior Data Center Engineers.


**Overview:**


M247 is seeking a highly skilled Senior Data Center Networking Engineer to join our team on a contract basis. The successful candidate will have extensive experience designing, implementing, and managing data center networks.


**Responsibilities:**

* Designing, building, and maintaining the data center networks
* Installing and configuring networking equipment and related systems
* Managing and troubleshooting data center network issues
* Conduct network assessments and audits
* Participate in the planning and implementation of data center upgrades and expansions
* Create and maintain network documentation
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver network solutions


**Personality Traits:**

* Extremely performance driven
* Ability to work independently
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills
* Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with a high degree of accuracy
* Ability to work effectively in a team environment

**Qualifications:**

* Strong communication and interpersonal skills
* CCNP Data Center certification or higher
* Minimum10 years of experience in the following Data Center technologies:
* ACI planning and managing complex migrations of infra to the fabric, and implementing remote ACI extensions
* SDA planning and managing complex migration of entire sites to SDA
* DR planning and testing across local and regional DC’s
* SD-WAN planning and managing of SD-WAN implementation
* Network Virtualization and Automation – NFV, SDN, DNA, ISE, Ansible, Puppet, Chef or other automation tools
* Storage Networking – SAN, NAS, FC, FCoE, iSCSI, MDS
* Strong knowledge of networking protocols:
* TCP/IP and IPv4/IPv6
* BGP, OSPF, EIGRP, and IS-IS (Routing Protocols)
* VxLAN, OTV, and LISP (Overlay Networking)
* STP, RSTP, and MSTP
* EtherChannel and LACP
* Network performance tool implementation – Netscout, ExtraHop, Gigamon.


**Requirements:**

* Must pass a thorough background check and 12-panel drug test
* Ability to lift and move heavy equipment
* Travel requirement up to 25%
* US citizens or green card holders only
* 1099 or C2C only
* No agencies or recruiting firms

  

**Compensation:**

* Hourly rate range $85 – $115
* Travel expenses reimbursed per client travel policy

  



  

This is a remote position.

title: Senior Cloud Architect
description:
**Job Description**  

The Senior Cloud Architect is an individual contributor role responsible for the design, architecture, engineering, and standardization of all cloud infrastructure environments including storage, computer, networking, virtualization, automation systems, and all associated hardware and software solutions. The Senior Cloud Architect is also responsible for setting the strategic direction of cloud services spanning infrastructure, platform, and software as a service; ensuring standard designs and implementation processes are followed consistently throughout the organization. The goal at MasterBrand is to digitally transform core business capabilities; shedding outdated on-premises platforms for newer generation cloud services and to adopt a “cloud-first” approach to existing and emerging capabilities of the business.

**This is a remote-based position. Selected candidate must be able to conduct business during the Eastern or Central time zones. Preferred locations are in the Cleveland, OH / Deerfield, IL / or Jasper, IN areas.**

**Responsibilities:**

* Develop standards and processes for the design, standardization, engineering, implementation, and maximization of cloud services used across MasterBrand.
* Partner closely with cloud partners to understand changing technologies, designs, and landscapes to roadmap changes and ensure proper fit with company objectives and technology dependencies.
* Form strong partnerships with MasterBrand digital technology and business peers to understand requirements and, problems to solve, and to align with overall business strategies.
* Ensure that security and risk management is embedded in all cloud service designs, engineering solutions, and implementations to ensure adequate protection of digital assets and data used to operate MasterBrand’s business.
* Consistently seek opportunities to scale cloud solutions to maximize effectiveness and efficiency both from a performance and cost perspective.
* Operate as a subject matter expert, designer, engineer, implementer, and consultant to any initiatives related to cloud services used across the enterprise.
* Communicate clearly and concisely with a professional demeanor to all levels of the organization

  

**Qualifications**  

* Bachelor’s Degree in MIS or Computer Science preferred, or relevant concentration, with a minimum of five (5) years of experience; or a minimum (7) seven years relevant and equivalent business or IT experience.
* Minimum of three (3) years of Azure service management including integration, identity, security, storage, virtualization, compute, messaging, and networking within the Azure platform.
* Minimum of three (3) years of traditional compute, application, identity, and network experience (e.g., traditional data center, recommend and implement security hardening technical controls)
* Preferably have one or more of the following certifications: CISSP, Azure AZ-104, AZ-500, or above,
* Strong understanding of security concepts including SIEM, EDR, Network, Cloud, and Data security technologies.
* Experience in leading technical aspects of project work, integrating between IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS, and consulting adjacent teams on best approaches to cloud adoption.
* Experience in migrating from traditional on-premise technologies to cloud platforms is required.
* Strong analytical, documentation and communication skills.

**Skills and Abilities:**

* Ability to motivate, lead, and positively influence team members
* A thoughtful leader with a collaborative leadership style, can-do attitude, and innovative mindset
* Excellent interpersonal and communication skills with the ability to interact and build trust across all levels of the organization
* Ability to work in a complex matrix organization structure which include holding company and owned subsidiaries
* Proven analytical and problem-solving abilities
* Strong leadership and change management skills
* Strong attention to detail and accuracy
* Strong communication skills – verbal, listening, written & presentation

**Culture:**

* Demonstrates trust in the process of lean methodologies and tools. Approaches situations through a fact-based lens. Analyzes data, draws conclusions, make recommendations, and present findings. Critically assesses and simplifies processes and controls, and challenge business drivers and risks.
* Embraces the team through strong interpersonal skills and the ability to relate to people at all levels of the organization, including diverse viewpoints. Seeks to understand and involves others in problem-solving. Proven track record of building a team and managing change.
* Moves forward through strong organizational and execution skills. Able to champion core issues, develop resourceful and creative solutions and drive results at all levels of the organization. Strong attention to detail and follow-through skills are a must. Ability to drive successful execution of strategic plans. Adaptable and flexible to changing business conditions and priorities.

  

**Additional Information**  

For nearly 70 years, MasterBrand has been shaping the places where people come together, enriching lives and creating meaningful memories for our customers. That, combined with our stylish products, expansive dealer and retail network, and dedicated associates, has helped make us the number one North American residential cabinet business. Our unique culture of continuous improvement is based on trusting the tools, empowering the team and moving forward, and is kept alive by our more than 14,000 associates across 20 plus manufacturing facility and offices. Visit www.masterbrand.com to learn more and join us in building great experiences together!

**Equal Employment Opportunity**


MasterBrand Cabinets LLC is an equal opportunity employer. MasterBrand Cabinets LLC’s policy is not to discriminate against any applicant or employee based on race, color, religion, sex, gender identity or expression, national origin, ancestry, age, disability/handicap status, marital status, military status, sexual orientation, genetic history or information, or any other basis protected by federal, state or local laws. MasterBrand Cabinets LLC also prohibits harassment of applicants or employees based on any of these protected categories. It is also MasterBrand Cabinets LLC’s policy to comply with all applicable federal, state and local laws respecting consideration of unemployment status in making hiring decisions.

**Reasonable Accommodations**


MasterBrand Cabinets LLC is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities. If you have a disability and wish to discuss potential accommodations related to applying for employment, please contact us at staffing@masterbrand.com.

* Actual pay will vary based on qualifications and other factors

title: Network Engineer
description:
**About Us**

Haven Transportation aims to legitimize and innovate micromobility by providing cities with our proprietary software, e-bikes, e-scooters, and Havens™ that will improve quality and control over this new form of transportation. Our products and platform address an unmet need in the US Market for a flexible and customizable docked-based micromobility platform that cities can use to improve safety, transit, and environmental consciousness without exorbitant expense. We intend to partner with cities and start pilot programs that will mark a shift in the transportation systems of America.

**Position Description**

The Network Engineer will be responsible for client service delivery of high level and tactical solutions for municipal networks, security planning, design, implementation, installation, & troubleshooting. They will deliver cost effective solutions in helping to architect reliable services & sustainable results for meeting & exceeding Haven IT requirements.

Role provides subject matter expertise in delivering technical direction, managed services, standards compliance, architecture, and responsive client communications to support client acquisition, retention, and delivery of client requirements. **This position is a hybrid work schedule working 3 days remote and 2 day onsite in Indianapolis, IN.**

**Responsibilities:**

* Delivers and maintains in-depth, up to date knowledge of solutions, standards, guidelines, industry trends, etc. for **client networks &** **IT infrastructure**, including **LAN**, **WAN**, Wireless, Data Center, networking, **Off-site storage**, managed services and interconnection
* Evaluates and selects from existing and emerging technologies the options best fitting the client business and IT strategic needs
* Responds to and manages assigned projects ensuring on-time results and thorough documentation
* Troubleshoots & repairs complex or abstract cross functional customer technical issues
* Assists in the development and presentation of strategic solutions & proposals to customers supporting the sales and delivery cycles
* Provides advice training and support to less experienced professionals in the service delivery organization
* Delivers results that support company revenue, productivity, customer satisfaction and service delivery objectives
* Achieve annual training and certification targets as assigned

**Requirements:**

* Minimum Bachelors of Computer Science, Engineering, IT, **or equivalent experience in a related field**
* At least 3+ years successful service delivery experience, in the Information Technology, Cloud Computing, Outsourcing, and/or Managed Services fields
* Vulnerability remediation and reporting based on the results of network scans
* Analyze problems, evaluate technical issues, test, maintain, modify, integrate and monitor network systems
* Perform tier one, two, and three technical support
* Knowledge of LAN/WAN/WLAN, VPN, switching & routing technology, protocols, and optimization, network security, firewalls and IPS
* Strong communications skills and ability to work in a collaborative cross functional team

**Skills that stand out:**

* Knowledge of **Fortinet**
* Knowledge of **Ubiquiti**
* Familiarity with **Cisco or Arista** solutions
* Advanced network certifications such as **CCNA**, **CCNP**, **VCP** series certifications or equivalent experience a plus
* Experience or exposure to proposal development, budget management, and product management

**Benefits**

* Competitive salary $86,000 - $106,000
* Health Insurance
* Dental Insurance
* Up to 3 weeks PTO
* Remote Work
* 401k and other retirement savings options available
* Personal career training/certification budget of $2,500 per year
* Potential for equity ownership

title: Solution Architect
description: Client seeks a Solution Architect to perform duties pertaining to the assessment phase of an Access Modernization project. Client currently has 23 Access applications that are used to track various aspects of business. These applications range in functionality from simple to quite complex, and many are critical to business functions. There are also numerous manual paper processes associated with these Access applications. The focus of the Access Modernization project is to replace obsolete and unmaintainable Access applications that no longer meet business needs with modern solutions that meet business needs and are streamlined, efficient, and secure. This will include the automation of manual processes associated with the applications where possible. The Solution Architect resource will assess 23 Access applications (including high-level business requirements, data flows, and any related manual processes) and provide recommendations as to replacement with off the shelf software, replacement with custom-built application, or leaving as is. Minimum Qualifications [Provide Dates (MM/YYYY - MM/YYYY) and Client Names for each engagement where the resource has demonstrated each minimum qualification. Yes/no is not sufficient. Submissions that do not clearly demonstrate that the minimum qualifications are met will not be considered under this event.] Five (5) years’ experience defining high level requirements Five (5) years’ experience defining business needs Five (5) years’ experience defining data flows

title: Solution Architect
description:
**Become an Outcoder as a Solution Architect**


We are looking for a Solution Architect to join our team and implement systems architecture to help solve our organization's network problems. Solution Architect responsibilities include testing and integrating program software systems to address and solve specific business problems within an organization. Ultimately, you will work with the organization's leaders to identify the issues and then with our IT Team to address them with innovative software solutions.


**What you'll need to be successful:**


* Proven work experience as a Solution Architect or similar role
* Previous project management experience is advantageous
* In-depth understanding of coding languages
* Sound knowledge of various operating systems and databases
* Efficient communication skills
* Strong organizational and leadership skills
* Bachelor's degree in information technology or computer science is preferred


**About us:** EX² Outcoding is a premier solution provider of a broad range of outsourcing services, combining proven expertise in technology and project execution for companies searching for high-quality software development solutions. We specialize in delivering the best technical solution but also in enhancing that solution creatively by working closely with stakeholders to understand the business context.


#LI-REMOTE

title: Senior Network Architect - Remote
description:
**Job Summary:**

OTS is seeking a Sr. Network Architect who is under limited supervision, responsible for high-level network planning, design, and initial deployment. May lead or mentor lower-level team members.

 **Job Duties:**

* Develops network architectures that provide end-to-end application solutions; provides advanced network designs; recommends how network systems could evolve to maintain compatibility with industry standards; forecasts network changes and recommends network systems solutions using current and emerging technologies.
* Translates business requirements into network or process designs.
* Approves and modifies network design and architecture to ensure compliance.
* Configures and maintains routers, switches, and hubs for the network systems (including wireless and VoIP).
* Plans and recommends network hardware, systems management software and architecture.
* Evaluates and recommends new products and maintains knowledge of emerging technologies for future planning purposes.
* Monitors network performance, capacity planning activities, and is proactive in assessing and making recommendations for improvements across the various deployed systems/services to ensure consistent operational guidelines, system capacity and performance analysis, and configuration optimization.
* Coordinates all network topology documentation and testing plans.
* Performs all other duties as assigned.

 **Education:**

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Business Administration, or related field is required.


Master's degree preferred.

* In lieu of a degree will consider extra years of experience.

 **Experience:**

* Eight (8) or more years of related experience is required
* Experience with Cisco & Juniper Networking equipment
* Experience with Cisco Unified Communications Systems
* Experience with Cisco ACI
* Experience with Cisco DNA-C/Wireless
* Experience with Palo Alto Firewalls
* Experience with Infoblox DNS/DHCP

title: AWS Cloud Architect
description:
As an AWS Solutions Architect at Commit, you will play a crucial role in designing and implementing scalable, secure, and cost-effective solutions for our clients' cloud-based infrastructure using AWS. You will work closely with prospects, clients, internal teams, and AWS resources to architect and deliver solutions that meet the client's business objectives and requirements.


Responsibilities:

* Solution Design: Collaborate with prospects and clients to understand their business needs, technical requirements, and existing infrastructure. Based on these, design and architect AWS-based solutions that align with industry best practices, security standards, scalability, and cost optimization.
* Technical Expertise: Demonstrate expertise in AWS services, architectures, and solutions. Keep up-to-date with the latest AWS technologies, trends, and best practices. Provide technical guidance and recommendations to clients and internal teams on leveraging AWS services effectively.
* Engagement & Collaboration: Engage with prospects and clients in pre-sales and post-sales activities, including requirements gathering, solution presentations, and technical discussions. Build strong relationships with clients, understanding their business challenges, and providing appropriate solutions to meet their needs. Develop and maintain relationships with AWS Solution Architect counterparts.
* Solution Implementation: Lead or support the implementation of AWS solutions, collaborating with cross-functional teams as needed. Ensure successful deployment of solutions, troubleshoot issues, and provide guidance on ongoing management and optimization.
* Security and Compliance: Design and implement solutions that adhere to industry-standard security practices and compliance requirements. Assess and mitigate potential security risks, recommending and implementing appropriate security measures to protect clients' data and systems.
* Documentation and Training: Create and maintain technical documentation, including solution architecture diagrams, deployment guides, and best practice documents.

  


Requirements:
  

* Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
* 4+ years of experience with complex customer production environments
* At least 4 years working with AWS Cloud services
* Vast experience with Windows and Linux Operating Systems
* Vast Experience with Active Directory, IAM, Roles
* Well familiar with SSH, HTTPS, Certs, Encryption protocols, and implementation
* Extensive experience in designing and implementing AWS solutions, including a strong understanding of AWS services, such as EC2, S3, RDS, VPC, VPN, Network Segmentation, Security Groups, ELB, and ASG
* AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate or Professional level certification is strongly preferred.
* Demonstrated experience in solution design, architecture, and deployment of scalable and secure cloud-based solutions.
* Strong knowledge of networking concepts, security best practices, and cloud infrastructure architecture.
* Excellent communication skills with the ability to effectively interact with clients, technical teams, and stakeholders.
* Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to analyze complex technical issues and provide practical solutions.
* Self-motivated and able to work independently as well as collaboratively in a team environment.
* Flexibility to adapt to changing priorities and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
* Located in the Eastern or Central time zone of the US.
* Nice to Haves
* Well Experienced with either EKS/ECS/Elastic Beanstalk
* Experience with Automation provisioning using Terraform or Cloud Formation
* Experience with deployment tools either Jenkins/Ansible/Puppet/Code Pipeline
* Experience with Designing and Deploying High Available & Disaster Recovery Solutions
* Highly qualified in writing Design Documents, Procedures, Proposals
* Experience with software development

title: Remote Multiyear Performance Tester
description:
For one of our ongoing Project we are looking for performance tester . The project is multiyear. Candidates can work remotely or onsite at Minneapolis, MN.
  
  

**Job Description:**  

Responsible for leading Performance test efforts and test resources, including large complex projects/multiple sub-projects across functional areas or multiple systems.
  
  

This person will plan, design and execute performance tests for all applications across enterprise participating in a particular release. This person works closely and collaboratively with QA team, Project QA members , capability teams, internal and vendor resources, solution architects, database administrators, network monitoring support , to understand and translate non-functional requirements into Performance specifications, conceptual solutions and/or designs and to ensure that projects are delivered with quality by adhering to SDLC processes and ensures solution development process is adhering to process controls .
  
  

This person will also be required to provide an overall recommendation on the health of the application based on performance test results and analysis

title: SRE Engagement Lead
description:
Reference For full time Hire. Experienced Enterprise Platform Architect with advanced knowledge in the following key areas:
  
  

* Deployment Architecture (performance, monitoring, operations),
* Benchmarking (Agile, program managements, network management),
* Design (compliance, security),
* Network Engineering (planning, provision).


Experience to lead the transformation of clients through technology by leveraging your knowledge and curiosity of current and future enterprise technologies, methods and approaches. Enable clients to navigate and scale adoption of New IT methodologies and operating models that drive business agility e.g.: Systems Reliability Engineering, scaled Agile frameworks, DevOps, lean architecture. Inspire clients with vision and understanding the art of the possible. Facilitate workshops to engage clients in Delivery and Operational operating models, and transformation governance.
  
  

Develop business opportunities that bring innovative technology solutions to a client's ways of working. Focus on building trusted relationship with senior client stakeholders, influencing corporate strategy, and building supporting vision documents. Develop business opportunities by creating strategic innovative technology solutions that transforms and enhances our client's technology offering.
  
  

**Responsibilities:**  

* Enable clients to navigate and scale adoption of New IT methodologies and operating models that drive business agility using SRE, Agile frameworks, DevOps etc.
* Define client's Delivery, Operational and Governance transformation strategy and roadmaps
* Conduct interviews with different stakeholders, across the organization
* Contributes to thought leadership through the participating in the development of support processes/procedures.
* Contributes to the definition of the client's Delivery, Operational and Governance transformation strategy and roadmaps
* Conduct client DevOps capability assessments and providing industry subject matter expertise on topics like agile, DevOps, SRE, lean delivery
* Create and facilitate workshops to engage clients to define future state roadmaps and models, and transformation governance
* Collaborates with team members to ensure consistency of delivery, adherence to standard practices, and continuous improvement.
* Provides training and mentoring for teams to ensure that process guidelines are understood and followed
* Lead client DevOps capability assessments and providing industry subject matter expertise on topics like agile, DevOps, SRE, lean delivery
* Create and facilitate workshops to engage clients to define future state roadmaps and models, and transformation governance
* Develop business opportunities that bring innovative technology solutions to a client's ways of working
* Focus on building trusted relationship with senior client stakeholders, influencing corporate strategy, and building supporting vision documents.
* Design and direct all aspects of Continuous Delivery implementation
* Advise, lead and work on high impact activities within the systems development lifecycle, and provide advisory across IT.


**Skills and Experience Requirements:**  

* 15+ years advising, scoping and delivering transformative technology services within Banking, Capital Markets, or Insurance industries.
* 5 years+ managing an SRE (or related) team that operates in a public cloud (AWS), highly distributed environment is preferred
* Experience in managing a release pipeline, from planning to deployment to monitoring impact
* Thorough understanding of what may drive business priorities, strategy and direction.
* Comprehensive understanding of ITIL practices, and in-depth understanding of customer requirements around IT operations. ITIL certification is preferred
* Ability to work well in a cross-functional, matrix management environment with a highly collaborative, team-oriented approach to problem solving
* Strong interpersonal skills to facilitate meetings and communicate complex concepts. Strong communication, negotiation, and relationship building skills
* Understanding of technical infrastructure delivery processes with the ability to adjust and apply this knowledge in a dynamic environment
* Previous experience building a new SRE team from the ground up and progressively increasing the team's responsibilities by coaching the team through the process of on-boarding services into the team
* A passion for SRE/DevOps principals and a clear drive to remove toil and run highly resilient/automated systems
* Experience with DevOps, Continuous Delivery, and related tools, such as GitHub, Jenkins, Docker, Ansible, or equivalents.
* Experience in an Agile delivery environment
* Experience as a hands-on software engineer so you understand the core principles of the engineering work
* Experience supporting customer problems and communication
* Experience or interest in speaking/presenting at tech conferences.
* Experience in communication and organization in large, distributed teams
* A Bachelor's degree is required


Consulting Experience is a plus.

title: IT Security Specialist
description:
* Bengaluru, India
* Tech Hiring
* 3059372
**Job Description**
-------------------

***Role Purpose***


*The purpose of this role is to design the organisation’s computer and network security infrastructure and protect its systems and sensitive information from cyber threats.*

***Do***

* ***Design and develop enterprise cyber security strategy and architecture***

	+ *Understand security requirements by evaluating business strategies and conducting system security vulnerability and risk analyses*
	+ *Identify risks associated with business processes, operations,*
*information security programs and technology projects*


* *Identify and communicate current and emerging security threats and design security architecture elements to mitigate threats as they emerge*


* *Identify security design gaps in existing and proposed architectures and recommend changes or enhancements*


* *Provide product best fit analysis to ensure end to end security covering different faucets of architecture e.g. Layered security, Zoning, Integration aspects, API, Endpoint security, Data security, Compliance and regulations*


* *Demonstrate experience in doing security assessment against NIST Frameworks, SANS, CIS, etc.*


* *Provide support during technical deployment, configuration, integration and administration of security technologies*


* *Demonstrate experience around ITIL or Key process-oriented domains like incident management, configuration management, change management, problem management etc.*


* *Provide assistance for disaster recovery in the event of any security breaches, attacks, intrusions and unusual, unauthorized or illegal activity*


* *Provide solution of RFP’s received from clients and ensure overall design assurance*

	+ Develop a direction to manage the portfolio of to-be-solutions including systems, shared infrastructure services, applications, hardware related to cyber risk security in order to better match business outcome objectives

	+ Analyse technology environment, enterprise specifics, client requirements to set a collaboration design framework/ architecture
* Depending on the client’s need with particular standards and technology stacks create complete RFPs

* Provide technical leadership to the design, development and implementation of custom solutions through thoughtful use of modern technology


* Define and understand current state solutions and identify improvements, options & tradeoffs to define target state solutions
* Clearly articulate and sell architectural targets, recommendations and reusable patterns and accordingly propose investment roadmaps


* Evaluate and recommend solutions to integrate with overall technology ecosystem
* Tracks industry and application trends and relates these to planning current and future IT needs

  

* ***Stakeholder coordination & audit assistance***
	+ *Liaise with stakeholders in relation to cyber security issues and provide timely support and future recommendations*

	+ *Provide assistance in maintaining an information security risk register and help with internal and external audits relating to information security*

	+ *Support audit of security best practices and implementation of security principles across the organization, to meet business goals along with customer and regulatory requirements*

	+ *Assist with the creation, maintenance and delivery of cyber security awareness training to team members and customers*

	+ *Provide training to employees on issues such as spam and unwanted or malicious emails*

  

***Stakeholder Interaction***

***Stakeholder Type***

  

***Stakeholder Identification***

  

***Purpose of Interaction***

  

  

***Internal***

  

*Program Manager/Director*

  

*Regular reporting & updates*

  

  

*Infrastructure (CIS team)*

  

*For infrastructure support*

  

  

***External***

  

*Customer*

*To coordinate for all security breaches & resolutions*

  

***Display***

*Lists the competencies required to perform this role effectively:*

* ***Functional Competencies/ Skill***
	+ Leveraging Technology - Knowledge of current and upcoming security technologies (e.g. Firewalls, IPS, DDoS, SIEM, WAF, Endpoint etc.) and understanding of compliance regulatory requirement like PCI DSS, HIPAA, etc.- ***Expert***
	+ Systems Thinking – Understanding of the Wipro system (interrelatedness, interdependencies and boundaries) and perform problem solving in a complex environment - ***Expert***
	+ Leveraging Technology – In-depth knowledge of and mastery over ecosystem technology that commands expert authority respect – ***Master***
	+ Technical Knowledge - Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP), Cloud Architect Certification from AWS and Azure, ToGAF or SABSA certification-***Master***
  

*Competency Levels*

  

  

*Foundation*

  

*Knowledgeable about the competency requirements. Demonstrates (in parts) frequently with minimal support and guidance.*

  

  

*Competent*

  

*Consistently demonstrates the full range of the competency without guidance. Extends the competency to difficult and unknown situations as well.*

  

  

*Expert*

  

*Applies the competency in all situations and is serves as a guide to others as well.*

  

  

*Master*

  

*Coaches others and builds organizational capability in the competency area. Serves as a key resource for that competency and is recognized within the entire organization.*

  

  

* ***Behavioral Competencies***
	+ *Effective Communication*
	+ *Managing Complexity*
	+ *Client centricity*
	+ *Technology Acumen*
	+ *Innovation*
	+ *Problem Solving approach*
	+ *Collaborative Working*
	+ *Execution Excellence*

  


***Deliver***

***No.***

  

***Performance Parameter***

  

***Measure***

  

  

*1.*

  

*Customer centricity*

  

*Timely security breach solutioning to end users, Internal stakeholders & external customers experience, CSAT, educating and suggesting right control to the customers.*

  

  

*2.*

  

*Support sales team to create wins*

  

*% of proposals with Quality Index >7, timely support of the proposals, identifying opportunities/ leads to sell services within/ outside account (lead generation), no. of proposals led*

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**SynapseIndia** is a 23+ years old Software development company having development offices in India and USA with clients across the globe.


We are located in Noida SEZ, within 10 minutes’ walk to nearest metro station.

  


**Why work with us?**


* **Google partner** and **Microsoft partner** company with certified professionals.
* **MNC** having clients and employees all over the world.
* Expansion plan to cross over 500 IT professionals within the next 6 months.
* Structured environment with industry leading **CMMI level-5** compliant processes.
* **Salaries are always paid on time**, from the time company started till date.
* Despite market conditions, we have **not laid off** people.
* 2nd and last Saturday of every month is off for everyone.
* **No night shift.** People are encouraged to work within office hours during day shift.
* **100% satisfied employees**. We place a high level of trust in our employees and provide them with ample growth opportunities.
* **Eco-friendly** workplace in order to promote health and well-being of our employees.
* Our offices are equipped with special **anti-radiation and negative energy removal chips**.
* We prioritize **job security** for every individual working in our company.
* We **celebrate all festivals** with enthusiasm and fun.
* **Yearly appraisals**. We have even given more than 100% increment for exceptional performers at times.
* We recognize and **reward the top performers** on a monthly basis for their outstanding performance.
* Provide benefits like **Accidental and Medical Insurance.**

  




**Who are we looking for?**


**Designation** - Sr. Software Engineer ( Blockchain )  

**Experience Range** - 3+ years

  


**What skills we are looking for?**


* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
* Proven experience as a frontend developer using React JS or Vue JS, Node JS with a strong portfolio showcasing your React projects.
* Proficiency in Solidity and experience in developing and deploying smart contracts, specifically ERC-20 tokens, on Ethereum and Polygon blockchains.
* Familiarity with blockchain concepts, decentralized applications, and blockchain integration.
* Strong understanding of web3.js and Ethereum-related development tools and libraries.
* Knowledge of best practices for secure and efficient smart contract development.
* Experience with version control systems such as Git and collaborative development workflows.

  




### **What is the work?**


* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and translate them into functional and technical specifications.
* Design and implement user-friendly, responsive, and visually appealing frontend interfaces using React JS, ensuring a seamless user experience.
* Develop and deploy smart contracts on Ethereum and Polygon blockchains, focusing on ERC-20 tokens and other related protocols.
* Write clean, efficient, and secure Solidity code while following best practices and security standards for smart contract development.
* Integrate frontend applications with blockchain backend to enable real-time interactions with the blockchain network.
* Implement unit tests and perform rigorous testing of both frontend and smart contract code to ensure stability, reliability, and security.
* Collaborate with blockchain architects, designers, and backend developers to ensure a cohesive and well-integrated end product.
* Stay up-to-date with the latest trends, advancements, and updates in React JS, Solidity, and blockchain technologies to continuously enhance your skillset.
* Troubleshoot and debug issues across the frontend and smart contract layers and implement necessary fixes or enhancements.
* Participate in code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and contribute to the team's continuous improvement efforts.

title: Information Technology Manager
description:
**JOB DESCRIPTION  

  

About KPMG in India**

***KPMG entities in India are professional services firm(s). These Indian member firms are affiliated with KPMG International Limited. KPMG was established in India in August 1993. Our professionals leverage the global network of firms, and are conversant with local laws, regulations, markets and competition. KPMG has offices across India in Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Chennai, Gurugram, Jaipur, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Kochi, Kolkata, Mumbai, Noida, Pune, Vadodara and Vijayawada.***

***KPMG entities in India offer services to national and international clients in India across sectors. We strive to provide rapid, performance-based, industry-focused and technology-enabled services, which reflect a shared knowledge of global and local industries and our experience of the Indian business environment.***

**DevOps Architect Job Description**

**Responsibilities**

· Simplifying the development process and operations


· Analyzing any setbacks or shortcomings in the operations


· Developing appropriate DevOps channels


· Setting up a continuous build environment to boost software development


· Designing and delivering efficient and comprehensive best practices


· Reviewing and managing technical operations


· Analyzing and streamlining the existing DevOps practices


· Monitoring and guiding the development team


· Using the right tools and techniques to automate technical processes


· Handling all deployment processes


· Minimizing failures and troubleshooting any technical issues


· Implementing effective DevOps solutions


· Ensuring all systems are secure and scalable


· Ability to drive the automation process  



**Education, Qualification**

· Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or a related discipline


· 12+ years of relevant experience


· Complete knowledge of DevOps tools like Docker, Git, Puppet, and Jenkins


· Familiarity with the latest industry trends and best practices


· Basic understanding of cloud-based environments


· Know-how of software development, testing, and configuration methodologies


· Knowledge of scripting languages like Python, JavaScript, and HTML


· Excellent analytical and research skills


· Strong leadership skills


· Ability to motivate team members


· Highly innovative individual


· Excellent problem-solving ability


· Ability to organize and manage time effectively


· Ability to work collaboratively and independently


· Good communication skills


· Demonstrating multitasking skills


· Familiarity with deployment process and tools


· Ability to maintain the confidentiality of any sensitive information


· Willingness to work in a competitive environment  



  

**Equal employment opportunity information**  

**KPMG India has a policy of providing equal opportunity for all applicants and employees regardless of their color, caste, religion, age, sex/gender, national origin, citizenship, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability or other legally protected status. KPMG India values diversity and we request you to submit the details below to support us in our endeavor for diversity. Providing the below information is voluntary and refusal to submit such information will not be prejudicial to you.**
  
QUALIFICATIONS  

  

B.E.

title: Development Operations Engineer
description:
**This is where you save and sustain lives**


At Baxter, we are deeply connected by our mission. No matter your role at Baxter, your work makes a positive impact on people around the world. You'll feel a sense of purpose throughout the organization, as we know our work improves outcomes for millions of patients.


Baxter's products and therapies are found in almost every hospital worldwide, in clinics and in the home. For over 85 years, we have pioneered significant medical innovations that transform healthcare.


Together, we create a place where we are happy, successful and inspire each other. This is where you can do your best work.


Join us at the intersection of saving and sustaining lives—where your purpose accelerates our mission.

**Posting Title: Senior Engineer Dev Ops,** **GSS & PSS**

**Your Role at Baxter:**


Provide technical or infra leadership to effectively define, design, execute Devops strategy and drive quality assurance for new and existing components of the GSS/PSS portfolio.


This position is based out of Bangalore.

**Essential Duties and Responsibilities:**


<>·<>·Stay abreast of innovation and new technologies in DevOps, CI/CD, test automation and test methodologies.

* Establishes a performance monitoring and metrics-driven methodology that ensures speed and uptime of all applications and infrastructure are quantified, tracked, and managed.
* Establishing the build, test environment working closely with global teams.
* Work closely with software engineers, Architect, Product Owner, and other stakeholders throughout the full software development lifecycle starting from product concept till maintenance.
* Drive the initiative to simplify the developer and tester operational problems.

**Your Team:**


You will be part of the GSS & PSS team in Bangalore. This position does not have any direct reports. You will need to work collaboratively with R&D and cross functions.

**Your Location:**


The role is located in the BRD facility in Bangalore India.

**What You’ll Bring:**

* Bachelors / Master’s in computer science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Software Engineering or related field.
* 6 to 10 years of related experience.
* Expertise and hands-on experience in DevOps, Automation, Microservices, Containerization, PAAS, IaaS, Build and Release Engineering, Configuration Management, Cloud Infrastructure Automation includes Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services (AWS).
* Strong experience in Deployment vis the Azure platform implementation including Security, Compute, Containers, Storage, Azure Network
* Experience with Azure Repos, branching, code review and code analysis tools.
* Hands-on experience with various DevOps tools and technologies, including Azure, Kubernetes, Docker, Helm, Jira, or Git source control and build tools.
* experience in IT Infrastructure & Azure / AWS Cloud designing, and delivering complex Infra & Cloud Solutions
* Expert in Helm charts - packaging the module and deploying through Helm, managing repositories, secretes, custom helm charts etc.
* Strong knowledge and experience on Azure PaaS and IaaS services such as Azure Storage account, Azure File Shares, Azure Virtual machines management and deployment
* Work with developers & Cloud Infra team to identify necessary Application infrastructure.
* Design & implementation of application hosting environment in Azure Kubernetes service, Container, Azure VM & Azure PaaS using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) Tools like Terraform, Ansible etc
* Experience with Azure Repos, branching, code review and code analysis tools (static and vulnerability)
* Strong experience Git, git-lab, bit-bucket, JIRA, Confluence etc
* Knowledge of scripting languages such as PowerShell, Bash
* Knowledge of Linux, Windows server, Monitoring tools, and Shell scripting

**Good to have: -**

* DevOps lead with expertise in Azure pipelines, defining DevOps strategies, branching merging strategies, experience with PowerShell & Bash
* Expert in Azure Cloud - service bus, CosmosDb, its configurations, event management, App services, Azure management SQL etc.
* Excellent troubleshooting skills in Azure cloud. Solid conceptual understanding of infrastructure and technology stack for achieving HA and DR ready implementations.
* Advanced understanding of core TCP/IP v4 network concepts to provide in segregated network environment (intranet/DMZ/extranets).
* This would include understanding of DNS, routing, load balancing, firewall/ACLs, etc.
* Self-motivated with good interpersonal skills.
* Good team player to achieve team goals.

*Baxter is committed to supporting the needs for flexibility in the workplace. We do so through our flexible workplace policy which includes a minimum of 3 days a week onsite. This policy provides the benefits of connecting and collaborating in-person in support of our Mission*

**Reasonable Accommodations**  

  

Baxter is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities globally. If, because of a medical condition or disability, you need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the application or interview process, please click on the link here and let us know the nature of your request along with your contact information.

**Recruitment Fraud Notice**  

  

Baxter has discovered incidents of employment scams, where fraudulent parties pose as Baxter employees, recruiters, or other agents, and engage with online job seekers in an attempt to steal personal and/or financial information. To learn how you can protect yourself, review our Recruitment Fraud Notice.
